div.head: The body of the cuirass
div.ab: The high plates of the pauldron of the brassard are like a masterpiece of the masters, for it is necessary that these pieces be very precisely hollowed & adjusted in order that the movement may be free. Cuirass bodies must be very evenly beaten & driven with the hammer.
Morions from Milan are all in one piece & thus better than those that are of two.
